name: Final Fantasy IX: Beyond the Mist
general_description: “Beneath a Stolen Sky” is a Final Fantasy IX tribute album created by the Pixel Mixers community. This 6 part album features 120 tracks (the complete soundtrack + some duplicates) made by an astounding amount of musicians.
project_involvement:
I contributed a cover to the theme of Oelivert, an ancient dungeon where apparently your magic ability is sealed.

Having never played the actual game myself, it was sort of a challenge to get the feel and intent that the song was supposed to portray. In the end, I kept some of the desolate feel while contributing my own ideas to the mix while drawing some inspiration from artists like Tomoya Ohtani, particularly on his use of Eastern instruments.

It was an interesting research project in instrumentation; learning how different Eastern instruments are played, and further, performing a realistic as possible performance in a short matter of time.

Serving as my first contribution to the Pixel Mixer’s, the track serves as a dynamic and breathtaking experience and was definitely an interesting challenge.
